content.raw:
Thanks for the suggestion Brian. The only problem that I see is that right now I remove all the terrain page files in the Heightmap constructor. This is a guarantee for not using any previous terrain page files. If there are multiple gazebo instances I cannot do this because a directory might be used by a current instance.

By using unique directory names I could let the directory as it is, and assume that it will be removed by the OS later. Although this solution is not really clean...

Any other idea?
